author: rwesten
msg: * Refactored SinglePartContentItem to a generic ContentItem implementation that takes the uri, blob and metadata as parameter but implements the whole ContentItem interface
* Changed all current ContentItem implementation to also internally use the new Blob interface.
* Added support for mime-type parameters to Blob. Also added an utility method for parsing mime-type strings as defined by RFC
* Added additional UnitTests. Especially checking for Exceptions on illegal parameters.
* also added the ".gitignore" that was part of Retos patch. Someone who is useing GIT should check this.

author: norman
msg: Allow to set maximal current connections in NettyServer. See PROTOCOLS-57
